concept.description: Creates a relationship HAS_CHECKSTYLE_ERROR between CLASS labeled nodes and CHECKSTYLE_ERROR labeled nodes.
concept.cypher: MATCH (cs:Checkstyle:File) WITH cs, replace(replace(replace(cs.path, '\\', '.'),'/','.'),'.java','') AS normalizedPath MATCH (class:Java:Class) WHERE normalizedPath contains class.fqn MERGE (cs)-[:CHECKSTYLE_RESULT_FOR]->(class) SET cs.fqn = class.fqn RETURN class.fqn, normalizedPath

concept.description: Creates a relationship HAS_CHECKSTYLE_ERROR between :Java:Class labeled nodes and :Checkstyle:Error labeled nodes.
